description: Routes an input message to a corresponding output based on text comparison.

input_text.info: The primary text input for the operation.

operator.info: The operator to apply for comparing the texts.

match_text.info: The text input to compare against.

case_sensitive.info: If true, the comparison will be case sensitive.

true_case_message.info: The message to pass if the condition is True.

false_case_message.info: The message to pass if the condition is False.

max_iterations.info: The maximum number of iterations for the conditional router.

default_route.info: The default route to take when max iterations are reached.

status.forced_true: Max iterations ({iteration}) reached - forcing True output
status.forced_false: Max iterations ({iteration}) reached - forcing False output

warnings.invalid_number: Invalid number format for comparison - Input: '{input_text}', Match: '{match_text}', Error: {error}

logs.pre_run_setup: Pre-run setup completed - iteration counter reset
logs.condition_true: Condition evaluated to True - routing to true branch
logs.condition_false: Condition evaluated to False - routing to false branch
logs.forced_true_output: Forced True output due to max iterations: {iteration}
logs.forced_false_output: Forced False output due to max iterations: {iteration}
logs.removed_case_sensitive: Removed case_sensitive field for regex operator
logs.added_case_sensitive: Added case_sensitive field to build config
